channel.title: Help with error
channel.description: im stump and trying to learn java better but i cant find out this error the error only occurs when i log out [code]JordanScape Server: Exception! java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136) at client.run(client.java:332) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Game saved for player jordan ClientHandler: Client jordan disconnected.[/code]
